name: Ethereal Escape (S1DsLoTH)
description:
Play as Gary the ghost, on the run from a horde of angry pitchfork wielding farmers inside a dark dungeon. Why are you in a dungeon?  We don't know. Why are you being chased by farmers? We don't know. All we know is you need to collect the keys and escape.

Use your abilities to help you in your escape attempt. Use your fear to scare away the farmers if you find yourself in a sticky situation or possess an enemy to quickly gain some distance. Or if you're really stuck use your Phantasmal Flight to fly through the walls to safety. 

Controls:

  1. WASD to move,
  2. Spacebar to Interact
  3. Q to fear all enemies in immediate vicinity
  4. E to possess the nearest enemy
  5. R to activate Phantasmal Flight and travel through walls for short time before popping out at nearest point
